alert.note: Alert for Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 8:29PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Norton County through 900 PM CDT... At 828 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Edmond, or 12 miles southeast of Norton, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Norton County, including the following locations... Densmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
